reporting_cycle: The Secretary-General reports on the implementation of all aspects of this resolution as part of his regular reporting to the Security Council on the situation in Somalia
summary:
The Council also:
* Encourages the Federal Government of Somalia to finalize and adopt a federal Constitution by December 2015 and hold credible elections in 2016.
* Expresses concern at continuing violations of the Security Council charcoal ban and requests the Secretary-General to raise awareness amongst relevant Member States.
* Underlines the importance of complying with the arms embargo, including reporting and notification requirements.

Finally, the Council:
* Requests the Secretary-General to report on the implementation of all aspects of this resolution.
* Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
